instructions.1: Add 1 inch of water to a sauce pot, cover, and bring to a boil over high heat.
instructions.2: Once boiling, add an egg (or however many you'd like as long as they are in a single layer in a bottom of the pot), straight from the refridgerator into the pot. Replace the lid and let it clontinue to boil for exactly six minutes.
instructions.3: After six minutes, remove the egg(s) from the pot and place them in an ice water bath or run under cool water untiul they are cool enough to handle. Peel, and enjoy!
